remarks: The predicate "is a lattice."  (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-2012.) (Revised by NM, 12-Sep-2018.)
statement:
islat.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
islat.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
islat.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
islat $p |- ( K e. Lat <-> ( K e. Poset /\ ( dom .\/ = ( B X. B ) /\ dom ./\ = ( B X. B ) ) ) ) $.
